disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following information is provided for general informational purposes only and should not be considered as professional architectural advice. Always consult a licensed architect or building authority before proceeding with any construction project.

rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with ample space for decoration and Bohemian aesthetics.
Spacious living area featuring vibrant colors and eclectic decor. Designed to accommodate comfortable seating arrangements and social gatherings.
Modern kitchen with an island counter and ample storage, incorporating local design elements.
Cozy dining area adjacent to the living space, offering an inviting ambience for meals.
Private gym area equipped with modern fitness equipment, ensuring a dedicated space for health and wellness.

openings.description: Spacious balcony adjoining each bedroom, designed to enhance natural light and ventilation.
Main entrance with secure access and aesthetic detailing in keeping with Bohemian style.

garden.description: Large garden area designed to provide a green space and relaxation zone, featuring local flora and water elements per Vastu guidelines.

bedrooms.description: Bohemian styled studio bedroom with its own spacious balcony. Designed to optimize natural light and maintain privacy.
Second Bohemian styled studio bedroom with a separate, equally spacious balcony, ensuring ample ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: A master suite designed with Bohemian flair, featuring a private balcony and enhanced privacy, in line with Vastu guidelines.
Study room equipped for work and relaxation, complete with ample natural light and a view of the garden.

openings.description: Balcony in master suite to ensure maximum exposure to natural elements as per Vastu recommendations.
Staircase exit providing safe and secure passage between floors.

disclaimer_end: Disclaimer: This design plan is a conceptual framework and should be validated by local building codes and professional architectural consultation before implementation.
